publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3353 Mr Andy Kerr: The Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Act 2002 (Amendment) Order 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee recommends that the Scottish Public Services Ombudsman Act 2002 (Amendment) Order 2002 be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*
